scripts.version: npm run doc && npm run test:doc && git add --all --force docs
scripts.remove-generated-files: echo "Removing files generated by itbl" && shx rm -r compiled docs coverage
scripts.compile: npm run compile:main && npm run compile:lib && npm run compile:test
scripts.compile:main: shx mkdir -p compiled && babel itbl.js --out-dir compiled
scripts.compile:lib: shx mkdir -p compiled/lib && babel lib --out-dir compiled/lib
scripts.compile:test: shx mkdir -p compiled/test && babel test --out-dir compiled/test
scripts.doc: npm run doc:site && npm run doc:md && npm run test:doc
scripts.doc:site: node compiled/lib/preprocess-html && jsdoc -c .jsdoc.json && node compiled/lib/postprocess-html && shx rm -r docs/replaced
scripts.doc:md: node compiled/lib/preprocess-md && node compiled/lib/build-md && shx rm -r docs/replaced
